description:
MEETtoken is a job-sharing and workforce matching system, initiated in 2015, that aims to help the employers and job seekers empathize with each other and interconnect for a better life. 
MEETtoken plans to reorganize the existing market so that each group (employers, job seekers, and agencies)  can legitimately be compensated for the values and rights of the labor in the MEETtoken ecosystem through the development of a decentralized distributed platform based on the blockchain, and build an incentive ecosystem system that can be compensated as information.
name: MEETtoken
